Runo – AI-Powered SIM-Based & Cloud Telephony Call CRM
Overview
Runo is an AI-powered, mobile-first CRM with SIM-based and cloud telephony call management. Auto-log calls, manage inbound and outbound calling, track leads, add notes, generate AI call summaries, and manage sales workflows from a single platform.
Products
* [Call Management CRM] (https://runo.ai/product/call-management-app): AI-powered mobile-first Call Management CRM supporting SIM-based and cloud calling, automated dialer, call tracking, AI call summaries, recordings, and live lead status in one app.
* [Auto Dialer] (https://runo.ai/features/auto-dialer-software): Automated dialer supporting SIM-based and cloud telephony for call centers and outbound sales. Integrated with Runo CRM to boost outreach, productivity, lead tracking, and call efficiency.
* [Call Center App] (https://runo.ai/features/call-center-app): AI-powered call center app for inbound and outbound sales teams, with cloud telephony support, mobile CRM, automated dialer, call recording, agent tracking, and lead management.
* [Telecaller App] (https://runo.ai/features/telecaller-app): AI-powered telecaller app supporting SIM-based and cloud calling with CRM, call analytics, automated dialer, and performance tracking to boost sales and customer engagement.
* [Lead Management CRM] (https://runo.ai/features/lead-management-system): AI-enabled lead management CRM app that tracks every lead from allocation to closure, providing real-time updates and call visibility to boost sales efficiency for SMB teams.
* [Sales Management App] (https://runo.ai/features/sales-management-software): AI-powered Sales Management App to manage leads, track calls across SIM-based and cloud telephony, and monitor sales team performance in real time.
* [Sales Call Tracking Software] (https://runo.ai/features/sales-call-tracking-software): Track every inbound and outbound call made via SIM-based or cloud telephony with real-time dashboards, call recordings, transcripts, and team insights.
Pricing and Contact
* [Runo Pricing] (https://runo.ai/pricing): Experience Runo with full access during your 10-day free trial. Choose a pricing plan that fits your business needs across quarterly, half yearly, or yearly options.
* [Contact Us] (https://runo.ai/contact): Contact the Runo team for any questions or feedback.
* [Login] (https://web.runo.in/): Access point for existing users to log into their Runo accounts.
* [Request a Demo] (https://runo.ai/): A form for potential customers to request a demonstration of Runo’s SIM-based and cloud telephony features.
Features and Integrations
* [See All Features] (​​https://runo.ai/#features): A comprehensive list of all features offered by Runo, including CRM, calling, AI, and analytics.
* [API Documentation] (https://docs.runo.in/): Technical documentation for developers looking to integrate Runo with other applications and cloud telephony systems.
* [Integrations] (https://runo.ai/integrations): Information on how Runo can be integrated with other tools and platforms to enhance functionality.
